verses.verse: Now when <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there <S%H3426>was<s%> <S%H7668>corn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, Why do ye <S%H7200>look<s%> one upon another?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H7668>corn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: get you <S%H3381>down<s%> thither, and <S%H7666>buy<s%> for us from thence; that we may <S%H2421>live<s%>, and not <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H1250>corn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

But <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> not with his <S%H251>brethren<s%>; for he <S%H559>said<s%>, Lest <S%H6435>peradventure<s%> <S%H611>mischief<s%> befall <S%H7122>him<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> corn <S%H8432>among<s%> those that <S%H935>came<s%>: for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was the <S%H7989>governor<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%>, and he it was that <S%H7666>sold<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: and <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and bowed <S%H7812>down<s%> themselves before him with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and he <S%H5234>knew<s%> them, but made himself <S%H5234>strange<s%> unto them, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H7186>roughly<s%> unto them; and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H370>Whence<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> ye? And they <S%H559>said<s%>, From the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>. roughly: Heb. hard things with them
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5234>knew<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, but they <S%H5234>knew<s%> not him.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H2472>dreams<s%> which he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> of them, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Ye are <S%H7270>spies<s%>; to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> ye are <S%H935>come<s%>.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Nay, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, but to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> are thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>.
<S%H5168>We<s%> are all <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>; we are <S%H3651>true<s%> men, thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> are no <S%H7270>spies<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Nay, but to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> ye are <S%H935>come<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; and, behold, the <S%H6996>youngest<s%> is this <S%H3117>day<s%> with our <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> is not.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, That is it that I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto you, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye are <S%H7270>spies<s%>:

<S%H2063>Hereby<s%> ye shall be <S%H974>proved<s%>: By the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> ye shall not go <S%H3318>forth<s%> hence, except your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> hither.

<S%H7971>Send<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of you, and let him <S%H3947>fetch<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>, and ye shall be kept in <S%H631>prison<s%>, that your <S%H1697>words<s%> may be <S%H974>proved<s%>, whether there be any <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> you: or <S%H3808>else<s%> by the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> surely ye are <S%H7270>spies<s%>. kept: Heb. bound
And he put them all <S%H622>together<s%> into <S%H4929>ward<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>. put: Heb. gathered
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, This <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>; for I <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>:

If ye be <S%H3651>true<s%> men, let <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> be <S%H631>bound<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H4929>prison<s%>: <S%H3212>go<s%> ye, <S%H935>carry<s%> <S%H7668>corn<s%> for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>houses<s%>:

But <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> unto me; so shall your <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H539>verified<s%>, and ye shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>. And they <S%H6213>did<s%> so.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, We are <S%H61>verily<s%> <S%H818>guilty<s%> concerning our <S%H251>brother<s%>, in <S%H834>that<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6869>anguish<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, when he <S%H2603>besought<s%> us, and we would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>; therefore is this <S%H6869>distress<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon us.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Spake <S%H559>I<s%> not unto you, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Do not <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3206>child<s%>; and ye would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>? therefore, behold, also his <S%H1818>blood<s%> is <S%H1875>required<s%>.
And they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H8085>understood<s%> them; for he spake unto them by an <S%H3887>interpreter<s%>. he spake: Heb. an interpreter was between them

And he turned himself <S%H5437>about<s%> from them, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>; and returned to them <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H1696>communed<s%> with them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> from them <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, and <S%H631>bound<s%> him before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H3627>sacks<s%> with <S%H1250>corn<s%>, and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> into his <S%H8242>sack<s%>, and to <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H6720>provision<s%> for the <S%H1870>way<s%>: and <S%H3651>thus<s%> did <S%H6213>he<s%> unto them.
And they <S%H5375>laded<s%> their <S%H2543>asses<s%> with the <S%H7668>corn<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%> thence.

And as <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H8242>sack<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H4554>provender<s%> in the <S%H4411>inn<s%>, he <S%H7200>espied<s%> his <S%H3701>money<s%>; for, behold, it was in his <S%H572>sack's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, My <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H7725>restored<s%>; and, <S%H2009>lo<s%>, it is even in my <S%H572>sack<s%>: and their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3318>failed<s%> them, and they were <S%H2729>afraid<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, What is this that <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> unto us? failed: Heb. went forth

And they <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him all that <S%H7136>befell<s%> unto them; <S%H559>saying<s%>,

The <S%H376>man<s%>, who is the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H7186>roughly<s%> to us, and <S%H5414>took<s%> us for <S%H7270>spies<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>. roughly: Heb. with us hard things
And we <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, We are <S%H3651>true<s%> men; we are no <S%H7270>spies<s%>:

We be <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H1121>sons<s%> of our <S%H1>father<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> is not, and the <S%H6996>youngest<s%> is this <S%H3117>day<s%> with our <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%>, the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> unto us, Hereby shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that ye are <S%H3651>true<s%> men; <S%H3240>leave<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> here with me, and <S%H3947>take<s%> food for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>households<s%>, and be <S%H3212>gone<s%>:

And <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> unto me: then shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that ye are no <S%H7270>spies<s%>, but that ye are <S%H3651>true<s%> men: so will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you your <S%H251>brother<s%>, and ye shall <S%H5503>traffick<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to pass as they <S%H7324>emptied<s%> their <S%H8242>sacks<s%>, that, behold, every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> was in his <S%H8242>sack<s%>: and when both they and their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6872>bundles<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%>, they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Me have ye <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of my children: <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is not, and <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> is not, and ye will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> away: all these things are against me.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H4191>Slay<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, if I <S%H935>bring<s%> him not to thee: <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and I will bring him to thee <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H1121>son<s%> shall not go <S%H3381>down<s%> with you; for his <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and he is <S%H7604>left<s%> alone: if <S%H611>mischief<s%> <S%H7122>befall<s%> him by the <S%H1870>way<s%> in the which ye <S%H3212>go<s%>, then shall ye bring <S%H3381>down<s%> my gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%>.
